enhanced_posts.text: "During our private dinner, I casually said the #Ukrainian ambassador was “no good.” Minutes later, #Trump gave the order: “Get rid of her.” No intelligence report. No due diligence. No national security briefing. Just the whim of a donor in a room. That’s how policy was made."
